sum_peg: Dear Sirs, we would like to inform you that the Company has received a Show Cause Notice from the Office of Commissioner of Customs (NS-III), Jawaharlal Nehru Customs House, Nhava Sheva, Raigad, Maharashtra, alleging short payment of custom duties of Rs. 24.81 crores in respect of import of certain items and enquired why this amount should not be demanded with interest penalty.
sum_t5: Disclosure under Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 – Receipt of Show Cause Notice under the Customs Act, 1962 from the Office of Commissioner of Customs (NS-III), Jawaharlal Nehru Customs House, Nhava Sheva, Raigad, Maharashtra
